definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: And for that I need a byte of volunteers, alright?
sentences.chinese: 为此，我需要一个字节的志愿者，谁来？

sentences.english: One volunteer, yes come on up what's your name?
sentences.chinese: 一位志愿者，好，过来，你叫什么名字？

sentences.english: This met the volunteer and to play amain role either by the donation or the participation.
sentences.chinese: 本会志愿者并且充当了一个主要角色或由捐赠或参加。

sentences.english: Those taking part were volunteers who were offered a limited edition copy of the photo.
sentences.chinese: 参与拍照的志愿者可获赠一份限量版照片。

sentences.english: I needed to travel or volunteer or take an unpaid internship.
sentences.chinese: 我需要去旅行，做志愿者或者去做无薪实习生。

sentences.english: No laws forbid payment to volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 法律没有禁止给予志愿者报酬。

sentences.english: We also need volunteers, skilled and general.
sentences.chinese: 我们也需要志愿者，熟手和普通的。
所以他们找了一群志愿者。

sentences.english: Next, the participants read an article about blood donations.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，志愿者们需阅读关于献血的文章。

sentences.english: The research team also studied a group of volunteers who watch birds for fun.
sentences.chinese: 该科研小组还研究了一群以观鸟为乐的志愿者。

sentences.english: One popular option for "gappers" is international volunteer work.
sentences.chinese: 但是，空档年最流行的还是跨国志愿者工作。

sentences.english: More importantly, I have been a warmhearted participant of volunteer activities.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，我还是志愿者活动的一个热心的参与者。

sentences.english: They are classic members - honorary members by definition - of China's new people's army of volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 他们是一群精英，是新“中国人民自愿军”志愿者。

sentences.english: When the cards have been folded into one pile, the volunteer spreads them out on the table.
sentences.chinese: 当纸牌折叠成一撂时，志愿者将其摊开在桌子上。

sentences.english: Of those in the targeted-trial group, 29% responded positively to the therapy.
sentences.chinese: 当然在针对性试验组中，29%志愿者的治疗成功。

sentences.english: If you have too much time—volunteer it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有很多的时间，去做志愿者吧。

definition: red waistcoat/floor trader in stock market/stockbroker
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
"left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them
